targets.query: SELECT last("uptime") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^atlantic/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(total) as "total" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /atlantic/ AND "path"  = '/'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
SELECT mean(used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /atlantic/ AND "path"  = '/'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
SELECT last("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^atlantic/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(total) as "total" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /atlantic/ AND "path"  = '/mnt/vmstor'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
SELECT mean(used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /atlantic/ AND "path"  = '/mnt/vmstor'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^atlantic/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(total) as "total" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /bass/ AND "path"  = '/stor'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
SELECT mean(used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /bass/ AND "path"  = '/stor'  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"
SELECT last("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^atlantic/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

targets.expr: ((pve_cpu_usage_ratio{instance="10.0.1.6"} / pve_cpu_usage_limit) * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1
((pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance="10.0.1.6"} / pve_memory_size_bytes) * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1
sum by (id) (pve_up{instance="10.0.1.6",template!="1"} and on (id, instance) pve_guest_info)
sum by (id) (pve_cpu_usage_limit{instance="10.0.1.6",template!="1"} and on (id, instance) pve_guest_info)
sum by (id) (pve_memory_size_bytes{instance="10.0.1.6",template!="1"} and on (id, instance) pve_guest_info)
sum by (id) (pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance="10.0.1.6",template!="1"} / pve_memory_size_bytes and on (id, instance) pve_guest_info)
sum by (id) (pve_disk_size_bytes{instance="$instance",template!="1"} and on (id, instance) pve_guest_info)
sum by (id) (pve_disk_usage_bytes{instance="10.0.1.6",template!="1"} / pve_disk_size_bytes and on (id, instance) pve_guest_info)
((pve_cpu_usage_ratio{instance="10.0.1.6"} / pve_cpu_usage_limit) * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info) and on(id, instance) pve_up == 1
